nodes.text: The Black Cavern was a sapient cavern on the forest moon of Endor. It was the source of sun crystals. However, the cavern was later exhausted of its crystals.

Author Joe Bongiorno planned to explain the Black Cavern's origins in the Hyperspace novella Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, but the story was never published following the cancellation of the Hyperspace service.

In the novella, an older Cindel Towani reveals that the Black Cavern was actually a sedentary B'rknaa whose bitterness was caused by the separation from his kin. Upon finding out his true origins, Cindel told the Black Cavern that there was another sedentary B'rknaa on Endor known as Mount Sorrow. The two lost brothers would then move close to one another and ended up forming a friendship, thus ending their lonely bitterness.
